hero.title:
AI Should Be Free.
AI Should Be Private.
AI Should Be Yours.
hero.subtitle: We build AI tools that respect your privacy. No cloud servers, no data collection, no compromise. Your thoughts remain yours.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Bringing Light to AI Privacy
mission.subtitle: "Svetozar" means "light of the world" in Slavic languages. We believe AI should illuminate possibilities, not shadow your privacy.
mission.privacy_desc: Every product we build runs 100% locally on your device. Your data never touches our servers because we don't have any.
mission.offline_desc: Internet connection? Optional. Our AI works anywhere - on a plane, in a cabin, or simply when you want digital peace.
mission.opensource_desc: Transparency builds trust. All our code is open source, auditable, and MIT licensed. See exactly what runs on your machine.
mission.free_desc: No subscriptions, no premium tiers, no upsells. Privacy shouldn't be a luxury. Our tools are free for everyone, always.
mission.noaccount_desc: Download and use. No sign-ups, no email verification, no API keys. We don't want your personal information.
mission.empower_desc: We build tools that give power back to users. You control your AI, your data, and your digital life.

products.label: Our Products
products.title: Private AI Tools
products.subtitle: Powerful AI capabilities that run entirely on your device. No cloud required.

localmind.desc: Transform speech to text with complete privacy. Professional-grade transcription that never leaves your device.

localwrite.desc: Enhance your writing with powerful local AI. Multiple modes, AI chat, and intelligent suggestions - all 100% offline.

localpdf.desc: Complete PDF processing without cloud uploads. Compress, merge, split, convert - all locally on your device.

usecases.label: Use Cases
usecases.title: Built for Real People
usecases.subtitle: From journalists protecting sources to businesses saving costs - our tools serve diverse needs with one core promise: your data stays yours.

journalists.title: Journalists & Podcasters
journalists.desc: Protect source identities with 100% offline transcription and writing. No server logs. No data breaches. Complete confidentiality.

legal.title: Legal Professionals
legal.desc: Maintain attorney-client privilege with on-device processing. Transcribe depositions and enhance documents without third-party access.

researchers.title: Researchers
researchers.desc: HIPAA and GDPR compliance is automatic when data never leaves your device. Process interviews and documents locally.

business.title: Small Businesses
business.desc: Save $360+/year on transcription and writing tools alone. Professional AI for $0. Invest savings in growth, not software rent.

students.title: Students & Academics
students.desc: Enhance essays, transcribe lectures, and process documents without expensive subscriptions or privacy concerns.

privacy.title: Privacy Advocates
privacy.desc: Audit every line of code yourself. Open-source transparency. No blind trust required. Use AI on your own terms.
